page.title: 12SPILLERS
page.content: Spillers Pet and Nutrition Unit started in 1968 in Kentford but recently was taken over by Dalgety P.L.C.. They have about 250 cats,125 dogs and 100 caged birds to test pet foods and accessories. There is an animal clinic and each animal has it's own medical file. To record the test results they use computers and videos. They have 20 employees. The animals in there are better kept than most pets in the home. Each dog has it's own kennel with a run. They also have possibly the best cattery in Europe. In the cat's room the air is kept at the same temperature and every 10 minutes it is changed. The cat's room has a place where they can go outside. They give the animals 2 portions of different pet food and see which food it prefers.
